name: floecat.core.cache.hits
description: Cache hits count for the graph cache.

name: floecat.core.cache.misses
description: Cache misses count for the graph cache.

name: floecat.core.cache.size
description: Approximate graph cache size by cache name.

name: floecat.core.gc.collections
description: Number of GC collections per GC type.

name: floecat.core.gc.pause
description: GC pause time per GC type.

name: floecat.core.observability.dropped.tags.total
description: Total number of tags dropped because they violated telemetry contracts.

name: floecat.core.rpc.active
description: Number of in-flight RPCs per component/operation.

name: floecat.core.rpc.errors
description: Count of RPC failures per component/operation.

name: floecat.core.rpc.latency
description: Latency distribution for RPC operations.

name: floecat.core.rpc.requests
description: Total RPC requests processed, tagged by account and status.

name: floecat.core.rpc.retries
description: Number of RPC retries invoked.

name: floecat.core.store.bytes
description: Count of bytes processed by store operations.

name: floecat.core.store.latency
description: Store operation latency distribution.

name: floecat.core.store.requests
description: Number of store requests emitted per component/operation.

name: floecat.service.cache.accounts
description: Number of accounts with active caches.

name: floecat.service.cache.enabled
description: Indicator that the graph cache is enabled.

name: floecat.service.cache.entries
description: Estimated total graph cache entries across accounts.

name: floecat.service.cache.load.latency
description: Latency for loading graph entries when caching is enabled.

name: floecat.service.cache.max.size
description: Configured max entries for the graph cache.

name: floecat.service.gc.cas.enabled
description: Indicator that the CAS GC scheduler is enabled (1=enabled, 0=disabled).

name: floecat.service.gc.cas.last.tick.end.ms
description: Timestamp when the CAS GC last finished.

name: floecat.service.gc.cas.last.tick.start.ms
description: Timestamp when the CAS GC last started.

name: floecat.service.gc.cas.running
description: Indicator that the CAS GC tick is currently active (1 when running, 0 when idle).

name: floecat.service.gc.idempotency.enabled
description: Indicator that the idempotency GC scheduler is enabled (1=enabled, 0=disabled).

name: floecat.service.gc.idempotency.last.tick.end.ms
description: Timestamp when the idempotency GC last finished.

name: floecat.service.gc.idempotency.last.tick.start.ms
description: Timestamp when the idempotency GC last started.

name: floecat.service.gc.idempotency.running
description: Indicator that the idempotency GC tick is currently active (1 when running, 0 when idle).

name: floecat.service.gc.pointer.enabled
description: Indicator that the pointer GC scheduler is enabled (1=enabled, 0=disabled).

name: floecat.service.gc.pointer.last.tick.end.ms
description: Timestamp when the pointer GC last finished.

name: floecat.service.gc.pointer.last.tick.start.ms
description: Timestamp when the pointer GC last started (ms since epoch from the most recent tick). Tick interval is controlled via `floecat.gc.pointer.tick-every`.

name: floecat.service.gc.pointer.running
description: Indicator that the pointer GC tick is currently active (1 when running, 0 when idle).

name: floecat.service.hint.cache.hits
description: Engine hint cache hits.

name: floecat.service.hint.cache.misses
description: Engine hint cache misses.

name: floecat.service.hint.cache.weight
description: Estimated weight of the hint cache.

name: floecat.service.storage.account.bytes
description: Per-account byte consumption for storage.

name: floecat.service.storage.account.pointers
description: Per-account pointer count stored in the service.
